extension.name: Google+ Feed Slider - Gantry Particle (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Google+ Feed Slider - Particle for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This particle is installed for the Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the particle on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files gplus-feed-slider.yaml and gplus-feed-slider.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
Moreover, you have to copy _gplus-feed-slider.scss to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/scss and gplus-feed-slider.js to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/js.
